alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 3:32AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County
